skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio makkah
Developer Terms of Use
des: Quran Radio Makkah is a live radio station broadcasting from the holy city of Makkah, Saudi Arabia. It focuses on the recitation of the Quran, featuring renowned reciters who deliver the verses with high-quality audio. The station plays Quranic recitations continuously, providing spiritual content for listeners worldwide. Additionally, it occasionally includes programs that offer interpretations, discussions on Quranic teachings, and guidance on Islamic practices, all aimed at fostering a deeper understanding of the Quran. It serves as a significant source of religious inspiration, especially for Muslims seeking to connect with the sacred text.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
